1. What do you believe is the biggest challenge your company is facing when it comes to employee retention? (Typically, businesses in the high-tech industry struggle to retain key employees due to the specialized skills and knowledge they possess, which makes them highly sought after by other companies.)
2. How do you think about the future of work in your company and industry? Can you share with me how you envision employee retention evolving to meet these challenges?
3. Are you satisfied with your current employee retention rate? If not, what do you think is the biggest challenge that your company is facing in terms of keeping top talent?
4. If you could have a crystal ball and predict the workforce needs of your company in the next 5 years, how would you ensure that you have the right talent to meet these needs?
5. How do you currently measure employee engagement and satisfaction? How do you use these metrics to improve your retention strategies? Are you satisfied with the results? If not, what do you think is missing?
6. Are you satisfied with your current recruitment and hiring process? How does it align with your overall retention strategy?
7. How do you currently measure the effectiveness of your onboarding process? Are you satisfied with the results? If not, what do you think is missing?
